generatedPrompts.backCover: Minimalist decorative design on a solid soft white background. A single, gracefully curved line in coral pink sweeps up from the bottom left, arcing towards the upper center, where it bursts into a small, delicate firework-like shape made of simple lines and dots in mint green and sunny yellow. The design is simple, elegant, and subtly energetic, providing a peaceful resolution to the card's theme. The bottom-right corner is left completely empty. The artwork uses clean lines and maintains the card's minimalist aesthetic and color palette.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Minimalist flat 2D illustration of two little cartoon girls, representing twins, jumping joyfully in mid-air against a clean, solid soft white background. The girls, inspired by the reference of a 'little girl kissing woman’s cheek', are styled with simplified, charming features. They have dynamic, energetic poses with arms outstretched as if celebrating. A shower of tiny, colorful confetti in pastel shades of mint green, sunny yellow, and coral pink falls around them. In the center of the image, the text "Happy Birthday Twins!" is written in a beautiful, clearly readable, playful handwritten cursive script. The entire composition uses clean lines, simple shapes, and plenty of white space, embodying a fun, energetic, and minimalist style. Key elements are kept away from the edges.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided multiple reference photos as input images. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent the people in these reference photos with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS:
- REPRESENT ALL PEOPLE: If multiple reference photos are provided, create cartoon versions of ALL people shown, bringing them together in the same scene
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles worn by each person in their reference photo
- COMPLETE accessories: include ALL accessories visible on each person (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.)
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

Little girl kissing woman’s cheek 

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Every person in the reference must be represented with their exact appearance, clothing, and accessories.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Minimalist abstract artwork on a clean, solid soft white background. A dynamic composition of overlapping geometric shapes in pastel shades of mint green, sunny yellow, and coral pink. A large, playful semi-circle anchors the bottom left, while sharp triangles and soft-edged circles seem to float and dance across the page, creating a sense of movement and celebration. The design is energetic yet clean, using ample white space to maintain a sophisticated and minimalist feel, visually connecting to the confetti on the front cover.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Minimalist design on a clean, solid soft white background. The message is the central focus, beautifully written in an elegant, legible, and warm handwritten cursive script. The text reads: "Happy Birthday to our favorite birthday twins, Vivi and Audrey! It's pretty clear that greatness decided to strike twice on the same day, and we're so glad we get to celebrate both of you. May your day be filled with double the cake, double the fun, and only half the shenanigans... maybe. Lots of Love, The Gilberts". The message is framed by two subtle, intersecting calligraphic swooshes, one in mint green and one in coral pink, that sweep around the text block, adding a touch of artistic flair without cluttering the space. The design is elegant, personal, and uses plenty of white space.
